Notes

Record Store Day 2013. First time ever pressed to vinyl. Limited to 4000 copies worldwide. Gatefold sleeve. Printed innersleeve + three 12"x12" printed sheets Includes cupon for MP3 download "Made In USA" on sleeve rear and labels. ℗ & © 2013 Modular Recordings
